import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{postBlogUrl}from'../utils/extractor';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InputPage=()=>{const[url,setUrl]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleInputChange=event=>{setUrl(event.target.value);};const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError(null);try{const data=await postBlogUrl(url);// Assume backend returns { job_id: "..." }
